item.title: From Transaction Scripts to Domain Models: A Refactoring Journey
item.description: Transaction Scripts organizes business logic by procedures where each procedure handles a single request from the presentation. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/from-transaction-scripts-to-domain-models-a-refactoring-journey
